Jaden had elbow surgical procedure in June 2019. He underwent âTommy John surgeryâ and had a ruptured ligament at the ulna changed by way of any other tendon, his medical conditions are good, and the recovery procedure is predicted to take around a yr.

Achievements of His Parents

Steffi and her husband, Andre Agassi, have won a total of 30 Grand Slam championships. Steffi, Jadenâs mom, is thought of as a genius on all taking part in grounds.
